@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Andreas Ecker (ecker) Martin Wittemann (martinwittemann) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The Html widget embeds plain HTML code into the application Example Here is a little example of how to use the canvas widget. 

 var html = new qx.ui.embed.Html();
 html.setHtml("
Hello World
");

External Documentation Documentation of this widget in the qooxdoo manual.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Any text string which can contain HTML, too

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The css classname for the html embed. IMPORTANT Paddings and borders does not work in the css class. These styles cause conflicts with the layout engine.

@description.body: Resets the user value of the property html. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #html}.
